What to get the man who has everything – the world’s smallest car. That is if he’s not one of those blokes who associates the size of his car to the size of his precious jewels.
Measuring a titchy 4 x 3 nanometers, one nanometer being equal to one billionth of a meter or one millionth, the 
 is the size of a single strand of DNA and creatively named, the Nanocar. To give you an idea of its size, an average human hair is 80,000 nanometers thick, so that is one itsy bitsy teeny weeny wheeler. And it really works, surprisingly.
Via  
.
title: Introducing the Smallest Car in the World
author: Linda
